#summary Molehill Drop 10 limitations.
#labels molehill,limitations

= Introduction =

A few notes about limitations in the Molehill API. Might change in future Molehill API versions.

= Details =

Max vertices per vertex buffer: 65535
Max indices per index buffer: 524287
Max num of vertex buffers: 4096, 256mb
Max num of index buffers: 4096, 128mb
Max textures: 4096, 512mb
Max cube textures: 4096, 256mb
Max programs: 4096, 16mb
Max draw calls per present: 32768
